TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HttpListenerContext extends System.Object

summary.span: Provides access to the request and response objects used by the class.

span.span: Provides access to the request and response objects used by the class.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供与所处理的客户端的超文本传输协议 (HTTP) 请求相关的信息对象。This class provides the information related to a client's Hypertext Transfer Protocol (HTTP) request being processed by an object. 此类还具有允许的方法要接受的 WebSocket 连接对象。This class also has methods that allow an object to accept a WebSocket connection. 方法返回的实例类。The method returns instances of the class. 若要获取表示客户端请求的对象，请使用属性。To get the object that represents the client request, use the property. 若要获取该对象表示将发送到客户端的响应，使用属性。To get the object that represents the response that will be sent to the client by the , use the property. 若要获取有关客户端发送请求，如其登录名和是否它已经过身份验证，用户信息可以查询中的属性返回对象属性。To get user information about the client sending the request, such as its login name and whether it has been authenticated, you can query the properties in the object returned by the property. 关闭对象发送到客户端的响应，并释放使用的任何资源。Closing an object sends the response to the client and frees any resources used by the . 正在中止对象放弃对客户端的响应，如果它不已发送，并释放使用的任何资源。Aborting an object discards the response to the client if it has not already been sent, and frees any resources used by the . 后关闭或中止对象，其方法或属性不能引用。After closing or aborting an object, you cannot reference its methods or properties. 如果这样做，你将收到异常。If you do so, you will receive an exception. ## Examples 下面的代码示例显示客户端请求的用户信息。The following code example displays the user information for a client request. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不会阻止此操作。This operation will not block. 返回对象都完成后已被接受 WebSocket 连接。The returned object will complete after the WebSocket connection has been accepted. 接收缓冲区的大小为 16,385 字节。The size of the receive buffer is 16,385 bytes. WebSocket 保持活动状态的间隔设置为默认值为 30000 （30 秒）。The WebSocket keep-alive interval is set to the default value of 30,000 (30 seconds).

summary.span: Gets the that represents a client's request for a resource.

span.span: Gets the that represents a client's request for a resource.

value.span: 表示客户端请求的 对象。

span.span: An object that represents the client request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果关闭此，它将发送到客户端，响应关闭包含响应，并关闭此属性返回的对象。If you close this , it will send the response to the client, close the that contains the response, and close the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何调用此方法。The following code example demonstrates calling this method. `listener`变量保存对象。The `listener` variable holds an object. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)]

summary.span: Gets the object that will be sent to the client in response to the client's request.

span.span: Gets the object that will be sent to the client in response to the client's request.

value.span: 用于将响应发送回客户端对象。

span.span: An object used to send a response back to the client.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你的应用程序通过设置属性配置响应此属性返回的对象。Your application configures the response by setting properties in the object returned by this property. 配置响应之后, 你将其发送到客户端通过关闭响应，或关闭此对象。After configuring the response, you send it to the client by closing the response, or by closing this object. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何获取对客户端的请求的响应和添加响应正文。The following code example demonstrates getting the response to a client's request and adding the response body. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#3)]

span.para: 注意： 此成员将输出跟踪信息时您的应用程序中启用网络跟踪。有关详细信息，请参阅 [在.NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md) 中跟踪网络。

Note: This member outputs trace information when you enable network tracing in your application. For more information, see [Network Tracing in the .NET Framework](~/docs/framework/network-programming/network-tracing.md).

summary.span: Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the client whose request is represented by this object.

span.span: Gets an object used to obtain identity, authentication information, and security roles for the client whose request is represented by this object.

value.span: 对象，描述客户端，或如果提供此不要求身份验证。

span.span: An object that describes the client, or if the that supplied this does not require authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表明它需要进行身份验证使用属性或通过指定委托使用属性。An indicates that it requires authentication using the property or by specifying an delegate using the property. 若要确定客户端的登录名和身份验证信息，请检查此属性返回的对象中的属性。To determine the client's login name and authentication information, check the property in the object returned by this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示了有关客户端，并将其返回到响应中的客户端访问的标识和身份验证信息。The following code example demonstrates accessing identity and authentication information about the client, and returning it to the client in the response. [!code-csharp[Net_Listener_Basic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Remoting/Net_Listener_Basic/CS/test.cs#8)]
